Copy Project/Select Destination Project Database or Project Dialog Box

Use the Select Destination Project Database or Project dialog box of the Copy Project wizard (Edit | Copy) to select a destination for your new project.

Field Descriptions

Contents list Displays a list of open project databases and projects. Expand the list as needed, then click to select the destination project database or project.
